text: André Gagnon (August 2, 1936 – December 3, 2020) was a Canadian composer, conductor, arranger, and actor. He was known for his works of classical and pop styles.Jean-Pierre Thiollet, 88 notes pour piano solo, Neva Editions, 2015, p.162. Many of his best known compositions were Neiges, Smash, Chevauchée, Surprise, Donna, and Mouvements in the disco and pop fields. He was born in Quebec.Bush, John. "André Gagnon: Biography", Allmusic. Retrieved 23 June 2013. Gagnon was appointed an Officer of the Order of Canada in 1978 and an Officer of the National Order of Quebec in 2018. Gagnon died on December 3, 2020 in Montreal from problems caused by Lewy body dementia at the age of 84.Quebec pianist and composer Andre Gagnon dies from degenerative disease at 84 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian composers Category:Canadian conductors Category:Writers from Quebec Category:Deaths from dementia with Lewy bodies
title: André Gagnon
